Actions.Name: Set the archived state of an inspection
Actions.Description: Choose 'Yes' to archive the inspection and 'No' to restore the archived inspection.

Actions.Name: Generate a link to an inspection [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: Generate a link to a specific inspection that opens in iAuditor/SafetyCulture.

Actions.Name: Disable an inspection web report link
Actions.Description: Disable the web report link to an inspection.

Actions.Name: Get a specific inspection
Actions.Description: Retrieve the full data of an inspection.

Actions.Name: Download an audit report (legacy)
Actions.Description: Download the audit report submitted earlier.

Actions.Name: Get an inspection media
Actions.Description: Get a media file from an inspection

Actions.Name: Retrieve an inspection web report link
Actions.Description: If a link has previously been generated for this inspection, it is returned. Otherwise a new link is generated.

Actions.Name: Export an audit report (legacy)
Actions.Description: Submit an export request for an audit into the format passed as a query parameter.

Actions.Name: Export an inspection report
Actions.Description: Submit an export request for an inspection report in the selected format.

Actions.Name: Check the status of the export request submitted earlier (legacy)
Actions.Description: Check whether the download report submitted earlier is ready for download.

Actions.Name: Search actions
Actions.Description: Find actions related based upon their status, priority, assignees, item, inspection and more.

Actions.Name: Search modified inspections
Actions.Description: Retrieve the list of inspections filtered by dates, template, completion status and more.
